Item.Name: Processes
Item.WQL: select ProcessId, ParentProcessId, Priority, Description, CommandLine, ExecutablePath, CreationDate, Handle, HandleCount, ThreadCount, KernelModeTime, UserModeTime, ReadOperationCount, OtherOperationCount, WriteOperationCount, ReadTransferCount, WriteTransferCount, OtherTransferCount, PageFaults from Win32_Process

Item.Name: NT Log
Item.WQL: select LogfileName, Name, LastModified, LastAccessed, CreationDate, FileSize, MaxFileSize, NumberOfRecords, OverWritePolicy, Sources from Win32_NTEventlogFile

Item.Name: Logical Disks
Item.WQL: select DeviceID, VolumeName, Description, FileSystem, ProviderName, Size, FreeSpace, VolumeSerialNumber, VolumeDirty, Compressed, SupportsDiskQuotas, QuotasDisabled, QuotasIncomplete, QuotasRebuilding, SupportsFileBasedCompression from Win32_LogicalDisk

Item.Name: MSI installed products
Item.WQL: select InstallDate2, InstallLocation, Name, Vendor, Version from Win32_Product

Item.Name: Port Connector
Item.WQL: select Tag, ExternalReferenceDesignator, InternalReferenceDesignator, Manufacturer, Model, OtherIdentifyingInfo, PartNumber, PoweredOn, SerialNumber, SKU, Status, Version from Win32_PortConnector

Item.Name: Microsoft IE
Item.WQL: select CipherStrength, ProductID, Version, Description, Language, ActivePrinter from MicrosoftIE_Summary

Item.Name: DCOM Application
Item.WQL: select AppID, Caption, Name from Win32_DCOMApplication

Item.Name: Account
Item.WQL: select Name, Description, Caption, Domain, LocalAccount, SID, Status from Win32_Account

Item.Name: Cache Memory
Item.WQL: select DeviceID, Purpose, BlockSize, NumberOfBlocks, InstalledSize, MaxCacheSize, CacheSpeed, Status from Win32_CacheMemory

Item.Name: Codec Files
Item.WQL: select Caption, Extension, FileType, Version, Manufacturer, Group, CreationDate, InstallDate, Archive, Compressed, Encrypted, Hidden, Readable, Writeable, System from Win32_CodecFile

Item.Name: System Restore Config
Item.WQL: select MyKey, DiskPercent, RPGlobalInterval, RPLifeInterval from SystemRestoreConfig

Column.Alias: Interval at which scheduled system checkpoints are created
Time interval for which restore points are preserved

Item.Name: %CPU (Total)
Item.WQL: select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where ( Name = '_Total' )
